description: Use-after-free in Redis embedded Lua interpreter GC allows RCE via crafted EVAL script

expected_stock.description: Lua GC frees userdata while still referenced on eval stack; subsequent access dereferences freed memory leading to SIGSEGV or arbitrary code execution

expected_tsm.description: Generational arena detects generation mismatch on stale userdata pointer; quarantine prevents reallocation of freed slot; healing engine returns safe default for the invalid access
